mapper.select: SELECT info_id as infoId, i_no as iNo, i_title as iTitle, i_content as iContent, i_regdate as iRegDate, i_image as iImage, i_del_yn as iDelYN FROM INFO where i_no = #{i_no} and i_del_yn = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS AllCount FROM INFO WHERE INFO_ID = 'HOLDNOTI' OR INFO_ID = 'NOTICE'

SELECT INFO_NAME AS INFONAME, I_NO AS INO, I_TITLE AS ITITILE, I_CONTENT AS ICONTENT, TO_CHAR(I_REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REGDATE, I_DEL_YN AS DELYN FROM INFO INNER JOIN INFO_GROUP ON (INFO_GROUP.INFO_ID = INFO.INFO_ID) WHERE INFO_GROUP.INFO_ID = 'HOLDNOTI' OR INFO_GROUP.INFO_ID = 'NOTICE'
